TopicTitle: Mission Control or IVA for probes?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I apologise if this has been asked before. It probably has.

But does anyone know a mod that allows IVA control of Probes? I have an idea to play KSP with Hud disabled (F2), and its possible with RasterProp, but the problem arises when i want to deploy probes. 

If anyone have an idea how to do this, it would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

There's something, I haven't tried it: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67450-WIP-IVA-PLUGIN-ProbeControlRoom-1-0-beta8a-IVA-All-the-things%21-new-3D-RPM-17](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67450-WIP-IVA-PLUGIN-ProbeControlRoom-1-0-beta8a-IVA-All-the-things%21-new-3D-RPM-17)

Apparently there's a patch for 1.0 on the last page: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67450-WIP-IVA-PLUGIN-ProbeControlRoom-1-0-beta8a-IVA-All-the-things%21-new-3D-RPM-17/page28](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67450-WIP-IVA-PLUGIN-ProbeControlRoom-1-0-beta8a-IVA-All-the-things%21-new-3D-RPM-17/page28)
